name: bgtag
description: A command-line tool for tagging and pushing Git commits with version increment and pipeline URL generation.

scripts.build:prod: npm run compile && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: npm run create-production-dir && npm run generate-production-package-json && npm run copy-readme && npm run copy-cli
scripts.generate-production-package-json: node -p "let pkg = require('./package.json'); delete pkg.scripts; delete pkg.main; delete pkg.devDependencies; pkg.bin['bgtag'] = 'cli.js'; JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2)" > production/package.json
